.. _`pyfastaq replace_bases`:

PYFASTAQ REPLACE_BASES
======================

Replaces all occurrences of one letter with another.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule replace_bases:
        input:
            "{sample}.rna.fa"
        output:
            "{sample}.dna.fa",
        params:
            old_base = "U",
            new_base = "T",
        log:
            "logs/fastaq/replace_bases/test/{sample}.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/pyfastaq/replace_bases"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
